name: Ha Anh Guest House
address: Dien Xa - Noi Bai, Noi Bai Airport, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Strategically located in Hanoi, Ha Anh Guest House offers basic and comfortable accommodation with free WiFi access in the guestrooms. It operates a 24-hour front desk and provides complimentary parking on site.

The property is conveniently 2 km from Noi Bai International Airport. Phu Tay Ho is 18.5 km away, while West Lake and Vietnam Museum of Ethnology are within 19.8 km drive.

Simply furnished, rooms come with tiled flooring, a clothes rack, seating area, minibar and a TV with cable channels. The attached bathroom includes towels and shower facility.

At Ha Anh Guest House, the staff is fluently-conversed in Vietnamese and English. Luggage storage facility, laundry and dry cleaning services are available.

places.name: Tram Y Te Xa Hien Ninh
